title: Hamilton Beach Stand Mixer Review & Test W/ Pizza Recipe!
description: This is a Review and Test of the Hamilton Beach stand mixer with Deep Dish Pizza Recipe. This item goes from $65 to $100 dollars depending on the store. I have been using this item for about 2 month with out no issue, I have done cake, bread, frosting, wh

asset.author: StatUpBox
asset.hookText:
This is a Review and Test of the Hamilton Beach stand mixer with Deep Dish Pizza Recipe. This item goes from $65 to $100 dollars depending on the store. I have been using this item for about 2 month with out no issue, I have done cake, bread, frosting, whipped cream and pizza.

Deep Dish Pizza Recipe: 

Depending on the size of the pizza how many u can do. for small convection oven about 9 inches , you are able to make 4 small pizzas.

you can use flour as you wish, it could be 3 cups of bread flour or
3 cups or all purpose flour.

2 cups of bread flour
1 1/2 cup of all purpose flour
1 tablespoon of sugar i use brown u can use white also
1/2 of tablespoon of salt
1 tablespoon Parmesan cheese
2 tablespoon of olive oil
1/2 tablespoon of oregano
1 pack fast acting active dry yeast
1 1/2 cup of war water  100 to 120 degrees

pizza sauce

3 tablespoon of tomato paste
2 garlic cloves
1 teaspoon of oregano
1 tablespoon of parmesan
water until desired thickness.
olive oil

Specification:

Mixing action gives complete bowl coverage
Powerful 300 Watt motor
Better mixing than 2-beater stand mixers
3 attachments offer mixing versatility
6 speeds and special fold setting
Stainless steel 3.5 quart bowl
Flat beater, dough hook & whisk are dishwasher safe
Mixing head spins as it rotates completely inside the bowl
Tilt-up head lifts out of the way for easy bowl access
Nonslip feet
Any Questions Dont Hesitate to Ask!

please subscribe to my channel

http://www.youtube.com/statupboxchannel

For  more vids 

http://www.youtube.com/statupboxchannel


check out my google + page

https://www.google.com/+StatUpBoxChannel



I created this video with the YouTube Video Editor (http://www.youtube.com/editor)
